detachmentRule.name: Red Thirst
detachmentRule.lore: Though they strive to restrain it, the murderous ferocity of the Blood Angels simmers beneath the surface of their thoughts. In battle, this rage drives them towards the foe and lends great strength to their blows.
detachmentRule.description: Each time an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army is selected to fight, if that unit made a Charge move this turn, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic and add 2 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit.

enhacements.name: Speed of the Primarch
enhacements.lore: Such is this warrior’s rage-fuelled speed, it is as if the Primarch himself fights alongside his sons.
enhacements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in the bearer’s unit have the Fights First ability.

enhacements.name: Rage-Fuelled Warrior
enhacements.lore: Fury burns in this warrior’s soul. A single moment of savage brutality stands between them and the maddening embrace of the Black Rage.
enhacements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, the bearer’s melee weapons have the [SUSTAINED HITS 3] ability.

enhacements.name: Icon of the Angel
enhacements.lore: The Icon of the Angel reminds the Blood Angels of the heretics who fled after laying low Sanguinius, exhorting them to let no enemy escape their grasp again.
enhacements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Each time an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) within Engagement Range of the bearer’s unit is selected to Fall Back, models in that enemy unit must take Desperate Escape tests as if their unit was Battle-shocked. When doing so, if that enemy unit is also Battle-shocked by other means, subtract 1 from each of those Desperate Escape tests.

enhacements.name: Gift of Foresight
enhacements.lore: This heroic warrior bears a glimmering of Sanguinius’ prophetic gifts. Flashes of foresight allow him to weave around his enemy’s blows with supernatural skill.
enhacements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Once per battle round, just after making a Hit roll, a Wound roll, or a saving throw for the bearer, you can treat the result as an unmodified roll of 6 instead.

stratagems.name: Angelic Grace
stratagems.subindex: LIBERATOR ASSAULT GROUP – STRATEGIC PLOY STRATAGEM
stratagems.lore: Sanguinius’ sons are blessed with the spiritual fortitude of their Primarch.
stratagems.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army has a mortal wound allocated to it.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

stratagems.name: Armour of Contempt
stratagems.subindex: LIBERATOR ASSAULT GROUP – BATTLE TACTIC STRATAGEM
stratagems.lore: The belligerence of the Adeptus Astartes combined with their enhanced physiology makes them unyielding foes to face.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: Savage Echoes
stratagems.subindex: LIBERATOR ASSAULT GROUP – BATTLE TACTIC STRATAGEM
stratagems.lore: The Sons of Sanguinius may embrace the Red Thirst but for a moment, if the need arises.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was just charged by an enemy unit.
stratagems.effect: Select either the Strength or Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit. Until the end of the turn, add 1 to the selected characteristic. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, add 1 to the Strength and Attacks characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.

stratagems.name: Red Rampage
stratagems.subindex: LIBERATOR ASSAULT GROUP – BATTLE TACTIC STRATAGEM
stratagems.lore: In times of great desperation, fury and ferocity can be a warrior’s strongest allies.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select either the [LANCE] or [LETHAL HITS] abilities. Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] and [LETHAL HITS] abilities.

stratagems.name: Aggressive Onslaught
stratagems.subindex: LIBERATOR ASSAULT GROUP – STRATEGIC PLOY STRATAGEM
stratagems.lore: The Blood Angels enact a sweeping advance.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army has Advanced.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to either shoot or declare a charge, even though it Advanced. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to both shoot and declare a charge, even though it Advanced.

stratagems.name: Relentless Assault
stratagems.subindex: LIBERATOR ASSAULT GROUP – STRATEGIC PLOY STRATAGEM
stratagems.lore: When Blood Angels execute a tactical withdrawal it is but a prelude to a renewed assault.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to either shoot or declare a charge even though it Fell Back. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to both shoot and declare a charge, even though it Fell Back.
